summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5868 for the improvement of Ivanhoe Place Northeast, from Sand Point Way to East 50th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77301, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
